alert.note: Alert for Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 2:19PM MST until November 28 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Beaverhead County and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM Sunday to 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
